com.here.mobility.sdk.map

Class MapFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • com.here.mobility.sdk.map.MapFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class MapFragment
extends android.app.Fragment
    A fragment containing a MapView, which conveniently forwards the necessary lifecycle calls to it.
